hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: I've heard Sploosh Kaboom is a tricky game.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #4# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bow# and #the Song of Time#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #the Bunny Hood#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spooky Mask# can be found in #the Market#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
